00062     static XMutex i18n_mutex;
00063 
00064 //! thread-safe version of i18n().
00065 //! this is not needed in QT4 or later.
00066     QString i18n(const char* eng)
00067     {
00068         XScopedLock<XMutex> lock(i18n_mutex);
00069         return QDeepCopy<QString>(qApp->translate("KAME", eng, ""));
00070     }
00071 }

00297 FrmKameMain::~FrmKameMain()
00298 {
00299     m_pTimer->stop();
00300 
00301     m_measure.reset();
00302     g_signalBuffer.reset();
00303 }

00305 void

00308 
00309 void
00310 FrmKameMain::processSignals() {
00311     bool idle = g_signalBuffer->synchronize();
00312     if(idle) {
00313     #ifdef HAVE_LIBGCCPP
00314         static XTime last = XTime::now();
00315         if(XTime::now() - last > 3) {
00316             GC_gcollect();
00317             last = XTime::now();
00318         }
00319     #endif    
00320     }
00321 }
00322 
00323 void
00324 FrmKameMain::closeEvent( QCloseEvent* ce )
00325 {
00326     bool opened = false;
00327     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(m_measure->interfaceList()->children());
00328     if(list) { 
00329         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++) {
00330             shared_ptr<XInterface> _interface = dynamic_pointer_cast<XInterface>(*it);
00331             if(_interface->isOpened()) opened = true;
00332         }
00333     }
00334     if(opened) {
00335         QMessageBox::warning( this, "KAME", KAME::i18n("Stop running first.") );
00336         ce->ignore();
00337     }
00338     else {
00339         ce->accept();
00340         printf("quit\n");
00341         m_conMeasRubyThread.reset();
00342         m_measure->terminate();
00343    
00344         m_measure.reset();
00345     }
00346 }
00347 
00348 void FrmKameMain::fileCloseAction_activated()
00349 {
00350     m_conMeasRubyThread.reset();
00351     m_measure->terminate();
00352 }

00360 void FrmKameMain::fileOpenAction_activated()
00361 {
00362     QString filename = KFileDialog::getOpenFileName (
00363         "",
00364         "*.kam|KAME2 Measurement files (*.kam)\n"
00365         "*.mes|KAME1 Measurement files (*.mes)\n"
00366         "*.*|All files (*.*)",
00367         this,
00368         KAME::i18n("Open Measurement File"));
00369     openMes(filename);
00370 }
00371 
00372 
00373 void FrmKameMain::fileSaveAction_activated()
00374 {
00375     QString filename = KFileDialog::getSaveFileName (
00376         "",
00377         "*.kam|KAME2 Measurement files (*.kam)\n"
00378         "*.mes|KAME1 Measurement files (*.mes)\n"
00379         "*.*|All files (*.*)",
00380         this,
00381         KAME::i18n("Save Measurement File") );
00382     if(!filename.isEmpty())
00383     {
00384         std::ofstream ofs(filename.local8Bit(), std::ios::out);
00385         if(ofs.good()) {
00386             XRubyWriter writer(m_measure, ofs);
00387             writer.write();
00388         }
00389     }
00390 }

00420 void FrmKameMain::mesStopAction_activated()

00431 int
00432 FrmKameMain::openMes(const QString &filename)
00433 {
00434     if(!filename.isEmpty())
00435     {
00436         runNewScript("Open Measurement", filename );
00437 //      while(rbthread->isAlive()) {
00438 //          KApplication::kApplication()->processEvents();
00439 //          g_signalBuffer->synchronize();
00440 //      }
00441 //          closeWindow(view);
00442         return 0;
00443     }
00444     return -1;
00445 }
00446 
00447 shared_ptr<XRubyThread>
00448 FrmKameMain::runNewScript(const QString &label, const QString &filename) {
00449     shared_ptr<XRubyThread> rbthread = m_measure->ruby()->
00450         create<XRubyThread>(label.latin1(), true, filename );
00451     FrmRubyThread* form = new FrmRubyThread(this);
00452     m_conRubyThreadList.push_back(xqcon_create<XRubyThreadConnector>(
00453                                       rbthread, form, m_measure->ruby()));
00454     addWindow(createWrapper(form, form->caption(), form->caption()));
00455     // erase unused xqcon_ptr
00456     for(std::deque<xqcon_ptr>::iterator it = m_conRubyThreadList.begin();
00457         it != m_conRubyThreadList.end(); ) {
00458         if((*it)->isAlive()) {
00459             it++;
00460         }
00461         else {
00462             it = m_conRubyThreadList.erase(it);
00463         }
00464     }
00465     return rbthread;
00466 }
00467 void FrmKameMain::scriptRunAction_activated()
00468 {
00469     QString filename = KFileDialog::getOpenFileName (
00470         "",
00471         "*.seq|KAME Script files (*.seq)",
00472         this,
00473         KAME::i18n("Open Script File") );
00474     if(!filename.isEmpty()) {
00475         static unsigned int thread_no = 1;
00476         runNewScript(QString().sprintf("Thread%d", thread_no).latin1(), filename );
00477         thread_no++;
00478     }
00479 }
00480 
00481 void FrmKameMain::scriptLineShellAction_activated()
00482 {
00483     QString filename = ::locate("appdata", "rubylineshell.rb");
00484     if(filename.isEmpty()) {
00485         g_statusPrinter->printError("No KAME ruby support file installed.");
00486     }
00487     else {
00488         static unsigned int int_no = 1;
00489         runNewScript(QString().sprintf("Line Shell%d", int_no).latin1(), filename );
00490         int_no++;
00491     }
00492 }
00493 
00494 void FrmKameMain::scriptDotSaveAction_activated()
00495 {
00496     QString filename = KFileDialog::getSaveFileName (
00497         "",
00498         "*.dot|Graphviz dot files (*.dot)\n"
00499         "*.*|All files (*.*)",
00500         this,
00501         KAME::i18n("Save Graphviz dot File") );
00502     if(!filename.isEmpty())
00503     {
00504         std::ofstream ofs(filename.local8Bit(), std::ios::out);
00505         if(ofs.good()) {
00506             XDotWriter writer(m_measure, ofs);
00507             writer.write();
00508         }
00509     }
00510 }

00512 void FrmKameMain::fileLogAction_toggled( bool var)
